title: Exceptional
text: Location with great staff to help you and listen to your request Bit expensive for a non sea facing room

title: I will go back again
text: Excellent spread of indian and continental breakfast Service ans staff

title: Will be back again.
text: Everything was great. We celebrated my husband's 60th birthday and they went out of their way to make it special for him. Nothing

title: Good place to stay
text: Can not recommend this place. One of the worst experiences I ever had. Not so friendly and professional staff, not so good food

title: Will be not be back again.
text: The hotel wasn't good at all. The staff was rude and unhelpful. The room was dirty and the food was terrible. I will not be back again.
